welcome_message_title: Welcome to Las Rozas de Madrid
welcome_message_body: Welcome to Las Rozas de Madrid, a charming city known for its beautiful parks, historic architecture, and vibrant cultural scene. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that our city has to offer during your visit.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Barajas Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal mainly used for domestic flights and some low-cost carriers.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: The newest terminal at Barajas Airport, primarily used for international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 4
terminals.description: The largest terminal at Barajas Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 4S
terminals.description: A satellite terminal connected to Terminal 4, used for long-haul international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, but may require a brief registration process.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Torrejon AFB Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Torrejon AFB Airport, primarily used for military and private flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
